Indian Economy.title: CBSE plans AI curriculum for Classes 3 and above from next academic year
Indian Economy.summary: India to integrate AI into school curriculum from Class 3 in 2026-27. CBSE drafting framework; over one crore teachers to be trained for AI learning.

Banking & Finance.title: Bank Holiday Today: Are banks open or closed on Saturday, October 11? Check here
Banking & Finance.summary: Usually, banks are closed on the second and fourth Saturday of the month, as well as all Sundays, for weekly offs. Banks across India remain closed on these days, as per RBI bank holiday rules.

Technology Sector.title: Indian students going to U.S. for higher studies drop 44%, steepest fall since Covid pandemic
Technology Sector.summary: In 2021, there were over 56,000 Indians who arrived on student visas in the US, which increased to 80,486 in 2022, and 93,833 in 2023. The number dipped in August 2024 to 74,825 (see chart).

Technology Sector.title: Pune-Delhi Akasa Air flight suffers bird hit; echoes June incident
Technology Sector.summary: The incident comes months after a similar case involving Air India flight AI2470 in June. The Pune-Delhi flight was cancelled after a bird hit was detected on the incoming aircraft.
